caption: The start of the video shows that it's part of a movie. The video start from a scene recalled by a police officer, who was dealing with a fighting issue. He pretended to a customer of KTV, then when the criminals came in with weapons, he showed his identity and quickly smooth things out. He caught all the criminal except one, who ran away. He came to chase after the criminal and use force to bring him under control. However, the scene was photographed by an ordinary person, thus the police began to talk with him and tried to delete the photo. However, it seemed to be a useless work, and the police can do nothing but return.
